name: Temple of Pythagoras
description:
A long time ago an alien artifact was left on planet earth for reasons still unknown, the power of this artifact helped men discover several principles about the laws of the world and the existence, through mathematics and geometry. Pythagoras was one of those men, he kept the artifact with him and made magnificent discoveries, bringing contributions to all mankind. 

                       He built a time to guard and protect the artifact from people with bad intentions. Thousands of years have passed and the artifact's secret has been hidden and forgotten, locked away in a secret temple somewhere on planet earth. 

                       Now a group of aliens travels to Earth in search of this artifact, so that it doesn't fall into the wrong hands. A sign indicates the location of the artifact, but this will not be such a simple task as the ancient mathematician placed many challenges and pitfalls everywhere, only those who are good at heart and understand the power of the artifact will be able to overcome its challenges. 

                       Understand geometric shapes, they say something about how to solve these challenges.

                        To solve the game's challenges you'll have to switch between two characters that have different abilities:

                        Trax : Infantry Soldier, his costume is designed to have good mobility on the field, being able to perform jumps to great heights, and his arms are equipped with claws that allow loading objects.

                       Zac : Engineering Assistant, wears a suit with four mechanical legs capable of climbing walls, its small size is also advantageous for traveling in narrow areas

CONTROL:

TAB to switch aliens

ARROWS/WASD to move

SHIFT to charge (tall alien)

E to pick up blocks (tall alien)

SPACE to jump

SPACE + SHIFT to dash jump (small alien)

R to restart current level
